name: 3D printer producing STANAG polymer magazine
description: 3D printer, currently busy printing the STANAG polymer magazine additively. Once it finishes, activate it and deconstruct the resulting printer to get the gun kit.

use_action.not_ready_msg: The printer is working slowly to bring you the magazine.
